website_summaries.verdict: Traditionalists will enjoy this easy-to-use coffee maker that brews up to 12 regular or bold cups in short order.
pros: Water reservoir is located at the front of the unit and basket slides forward so not a lot of space is taken up under cabinets
Controls are simple to program and use
There's a reminder when it's time to clean the machine and change the filter
cons: Some users have to constantly move their coffee maker, as their cabinets are too low for lid to flip up completely

customer_reviews.title: No loud beeps, makes good (hot) coffee
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, inexpensive coffee pot. Love that it does not "beep" when done brewing or at auto shutoff (should be highlighted in marketing by Hamilton Beach). Easy to fill water reservoir and easy to empty coffee ground basket. Simple to operate. No "plastic" smell or fragments as mentioned by other reviewers (I was lucky or they were unlucky?). I am not a coffee connoisseur (I drink Maxwell House), but the coffee is hot and just as tasty as my old Cuisinart (>2x more expensive).
customer_reviews.author: D. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful coffee maker and much bigger than I expected. Makes delicious, fresh coffee and keeps it hot. There is no spillage from carafe when pouring. Very happy with my replacement maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Coffee Maker!!! Excellent price. I researched coffee makers for several hours before choosing this one. I love that you pour the water into the front of the coffee maker, its so much easier to fill. The carafe is nice, the top is on a hinge so you don't have to take it off to fill it with water. Coffee flows fast from the Carafe! The coffee tastes great! We use the regular brew setting. It's very easy to use, I set it to auto program every night with just the push of one button. It is it is very light in weight. Not a problem for me, but some people might not like how light it is.
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few days ago after I accidently broke the carafe in my older Hamilton Beach coffee maker that I've had for years. However, I'm very disappointed as I poured a cup this morning and it was luke warm. I felt the pot and even the hot plate itself and it was warm but not hot. I largely pour my coffee directly to a travel mug so I can't even microwave it because they all have metal on them. I've been using Hamilton Beach for at least the last 10 years and this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A POS -- DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I AM FURIOUS. I WANT A REFUND ASAP! I bought this in July, it's December 8th and it's DEAD - no longer working. What a waste of money. I bought this product in July and it's December 8th and the coffee pot is DEAD. I want a full and complete refund ASAP. I want the money returned to my credit card. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make the coffee hot.
customer_reviews.text: The machine doesn't make your coffee as hot as it would be if you used a kettle and other form to make your coffee.The worst part about this is is that whenever you pour cold milk into this right after it's make your coffee gets room temperature since it's not that hot when it's made.I sometimes have to heat my coffee in the microwave.A traditional non-electric coffee maker makes much better coffee than this.Washing the pot and filter holder is just a chore not worth it when I use this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: hunter27

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker!  Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker! I got it for my office and the front fill and swing filter holder are awesome! The filter holder has a handle on it so you don't have to get your fingers wet or icky trying to grab some part of the basket. The coffee flavor is great. The amount of time to brew is what I would anticipate for a drip maker. The carafe doesn't drip when you pour either. I like Hamilton Beach coffee makers for their carafe designs. I do like seeing how long it's been since it was brewed. I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: A couple of design issues, but an OK coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker after I figured out where the damn thing was losing water all over my countertop. There's a large rectangular cutout at the top/back that will allow water to slosh out if you have to slide the unit out from under a cabinet and then slide it back to where I keep the coffee maker. I slapped a piece of duct tape over the cutout and haven't had any problems since. The filter "stick" is also a pain in the ass to correctly put back where it goes after replacing the water filter. No good feeling of when it's back where it belongs. Just 2 design flaws, but it's still a decent coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: C. Monster

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 4th died May 9th it had already been replaced when it died conveniently while the return window was still open. I give up not going to get another Hamilton Beach coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: *David*

customer_reviews.title: Very happy coffee  drinker
customer_reviews.text: I'm a die hard Bunn user owner for about 20 years and enjoyed the fast pour through feature but not so much the top seal leakage that the 100.00 dollar models seem to have after a few years. Didn't want to silicone seal again so I bought this coffeemaker for its compact footprint and front fill feature a necessity. Saw review complaining about oval filter basket? The cone filters are oval and fit perfect. There was also remark about overflow of fiter basket which I use 4 heaping scoops per pot and know I could double that with the size of the basket. Love the auto off and everything about this coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: JV3

customer_reviews.title: The "just-right" package
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - a cone coffee filter model that swings open in front and water fills in front plus includes a water filter. I like the bold setting, it pauses a bit at intervals to provide a little more hot water extraction. Room to fit under 20" space with the top lid open, I use my big mug to fill the water with no need to move anything. I found no other makers with this combo, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Problems started after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple decent months with this product until a few things started going wrong: first the function that allows you to remove the carafe to pour a cup during brewing didn't always work, then the "clean" indicator would come on even though the unit had just been cleaned. But the worst problem is a few months in the water reservoir began leaking so there was no way to pour water in the machine without creating a flood on the countertop. Now the unit is unusable. Maybe we got a bum one but I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the coffee pot because it is easy to fill ,and the coffee is very tasty. I don’t like the fact that you cannot see how many cups of coffee are left in the pot after two are drowned out. Also the pot is so light that it slides across the counter when you push your cup against it to draw out coffee. I have mine sitting on a rubber mat end it still slides
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value - for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It heats water and runs it over coffee grounds. Check. The front-loading features are nice if it fits under your cabinets or in other relevant space. The pause function is hit and miss resulting in lots of drips onto the hot plate. The basket capacity is less than it should be because grounds - even when loaded below the top of the basket - overflow and also adhere to the drip outlet. Tried different brew types (bold, 1-4 cups) hoping that they would slow the water flow and reduce those problems but no change.
customer_reviews.author: Me2

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Especially the convenient front load space for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Especially the convenient front load space for water and the swing out design to place the filter and coffee. The new design makes filling the reservoir and loading the filter and coffee a lot easier for me!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker works great! Have had it for a few weeks and no problems. Makes great tasting coffee, and brews fairly quiet and quick. I’m switching back from using a Keurig for years. I hate k-cups because they’re wasteful, but also tired of using the little reusable cups. I also think drip coffee tastes way better and am glad to be back to a regular machine. Looks great and is easy to use. Would very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Large pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Large pot, easy to program , and the front lid to put in the water is the best. I can put it under my cabinets now and not have to pull it out everyday to fill the water. Also very easy to see the water level.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly perry

customer_reviews.title: big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I thought this midrange model would, at least make good coffee, and have good features. It does have basic features, but the coffee is weak. I don't know if it gets hot enough or why it's lame. It does get hot, as evidence but the steam that escapes and removed the finish from the kitchen cabinet it was next to. Also, you can't make more than 9 or ten cups without coffee grinds spilling over into the carafe. I have had better coffee and experience from the cheepo $12 brands, though they have no features.
customer_reviews.author: BossAB

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Me - This Is A Good Coffee Maker!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot. This one is great bang for the buck. Coffee tastes great. My two favorite features: 1. Filling the reservoir in the front (don't have to pull it out from under the cabinet) & 2. Disposing the old grounds with the take out filter holder (no mess). Easy to program. Coffee is ready when I get up in the morning. It actually looks pretty good too with an abundance of stainless steel on the front. I do recommend this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love my new coffee maker. It’s good value for money for the class that it’s in. The only comment is that water does not completely flow into the reservoir compartment, the coffee maker had to be tilted to get the remaining water into the reservoir. This coffee maker is great for an average coffee drinker but it’s probably not for a connoisseur as the temp perhaps could be hotter when freshly brewed. For the price, I’m very satisfied with the functions & looks.
customer_reviews.author: EL30

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes life a lot easier at work because of the programmable feature! Being able to set the coffee the night before is great because the coffee will be ready in the morning regardless of whether or not my pre-coffee mind remembers about it! There's not much to the machine! It's easy to use and easy to clean! And the auto-off feature is nice too (which our previous machine didn't have).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coffee maker quit working 30 days after the warranty
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker quit working 30 days after the ones expired.I like everything else about it including the quality of the Cassi Brode. But it’s gonna last more than 90 days ugh.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Months Only!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it was a great coffee maker the past four months. Then, this morning nothing. The only thing that works now is the burner. Very disappointed to spend the money only for four months of normal usage. Stay far away.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Broken carafe
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this coffee maker it arrived with a damaged carafe. I like the coffee maker but on the replacement of the carafe had to go through the manufacturer even though i reported the issue immediately upon discovery. But in the end they did replace the carafe so all is well in my end. So far it has worked well. I would have given a higher rating if it wouldn’t have been such a hassle to get the replacement carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gifford

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: I've always found Hamilton Beach coffee makers to be good, reliable products. This coffee maker makes a very good cup of coffee. Having a setting for 1-4 cups of coffee is an excellent feature. The display is attractive and easy to read and the buttons are nice and big. It is a good-looking product, though I wish there was stainless steel wrapped around the sides. The one thing I didn't like was the fact that the place you pour water into is flat and shallow before it drops into the reservoir and some water tends to stay there and bead up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Fast, consistent and full of flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new coffee maker. Our old one, a Mr Coffee, took so long to brew that we would wait 45-60 min for one pot to finish brewing. No matter how much I descaled or how often it would never get any better. This coffee maker does a full pot in just under 10 min! I was blown away. The flavor is great and the coffee stays hot for 2 hours. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable coffee maker. *4 stars on cleaning are due to the elaborate process. I was hoping for a simpler way to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kball

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy a coffee maker over $20, but I'm so glad that I did! Having my coffee ready at 4:50AM every morning is great! This coffee maker brews coffee SO HOT, it is the chief complaint by my guests (but I could not be happier about that). I've always wished my coffee could be hotter, and this answered that wish!
customer_reviews.author: OhWerd

customer_reviews.title: Success after trying many others
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cone filter coffee pot to replace the one I had that finally bit the dust and found out they are not as plentiful as basket filter coffee pots and I hate pod coffee makers. Just picked this one randomly, hoping it would work out and was not disappointed. It makes a great cup of coffee and I love that you can adjust for less cups of coffee. I have not cleaned it yet so I could not rate on how easy it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LillyVonS

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, just brews relatively slowly
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, just brews relatively slowly. The best feature is that you can add water and coffee from the front, if the coffee maker is under the counter, you don't have to pull it out each time.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeredith

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Best HB model yet. Super easy to set up and super easy to use. Comes with its own water filter too and an automatic reminder when it is time to clean. The brew options are perfect and the taste of a fresh cup of coffee is awesome. The only slight change I would recommend to the manufacture is make the Program light and on/off light a different color. Both are white now and even though they are in different positions a different color would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob n Hoode

customer_reviews.title: It works fine with some quirks.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes coffee well enough. The front facing filter door and water adding port works okay, but you have to pour the water slow or it will overflow. Contrary to others’ opinion and my reservation, the weird charcoal filter design actually works (we have artificially softened water in our house and I can taste and feel the difference with and without the charcoal filter). The filter basket isn’t a perfect cone shape, so the coffee filter sags and can sometimes lead to grounds entering the pot. Overall, it’s a cheap machine that makes me coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Guyett

customer_reviews.title: Bought a resuable filter and everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I was looking for: a compact, simple coffee maker that has a programmable start time. For the last 5 or so years I made a French press every morning, but have started running in the am and need that added incentive of freshly brewing coffee. I live in a studio apt so waking up to the trickle and scent has been great. For those of you who identified the floppy filters as an issue: I ordered a reusable cone filter instead (Medelco #4 Cone Permanent Coffee...  and have no issues. I'm creating less waste and don't have to worry about floppy filters. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Its great value and the front loader is very easy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coffee maker. Its great value, front load for water and coffee, and also has the digital display for clock and how long its been since the coffee brewed. Looks lovely too in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MS  noname

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped brewing, thought it was the filtration filter and it wasn't, at first stopped brewing then it started leaking all the water out of it! Can we say electrical hazard! I have contacted the company, I am expecting a replacement and or refund. I have not heard back from Hamilton-Beach yet.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Coffee machine is easy to use and brewed pretty decent coffee. However, it only lasted about six months! I've tried all methods of cleaning it and I've had no luck. Amazon couldn't offer a replacement and Hamilton Beach is impossible to get a response from. Website claims they offer a 1 year warranty but so far, no one has gotten back to me. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I read the reviews after I purchased it, but before I received it and got nervous, but I’m very happy with the coffee machine. I’m not sure why people are complaining about the filter. I haven’t had any problems with the shape of it. It does seem a bit tall, but it fits perfectly underneath my cupboard. I like that it came with a water filter too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Must have brewed about 40 carafes up to this point, no signs of wear or anything. Easily programmable. Great to wake up to the sound and smell of coffee brewing. Yes, I sleep in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one and the carafe arrived broken. Returned first one to Amazon and purchased another. The second one arrived unbroken. Very easy to set up, clean and use. Love the door at the top/front to add water and the swing door on the front for the filter and grounds. Both have great placement if you have limited space under cabinets. Do wish that both sides had a window to view the water level, but overall we are very pleased with this coffee makers quality and build. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Cuisinart that died. Found the water fill and grounds basket easy to get to and use. Programming the clock and setting the schedule for my morning pot of coffee was easier on this coffee pot than on any of the more expensive models I've bought. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rogneby

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: If The glass pot is extremely delicate feeling and we have already had one break. Costs half the product price to get a new pot. You’d be better off just paying more for a quality product. Basic coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: AMMW

customer_reviews.title: Great if you make 8 or fewer cups
customer_reviews.text: with > 8 cups - it says you can do 12 cups - you get overflows/stalls/etc. Removing the carafe to sneak a cup while it is brewing half the time you get coffee overflow into the bottom/heater or worse onto the sink.
customer_reviews.author: wngoju

customer_reviews.title: Digital display does not work.
customer_reviews.text: After only 8 days of brewing the digital display failed. Cheap garbage. Beware before you buy! Not easy to use if you can't read the display.
customer_reviews.author: joyce sorget

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I wish you could give no stars...second HB I've tried and this is following the first to the trash...less than a month and it wouldn't send water from the resovoir and on trying it again the water wasn't even heating...everything else was hot...NEVER buy Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.author: richard zengler

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting cuppa I ever remember making!
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned it after receiving and made a pot. I had just started using a filtering product to clean the water prior to cooking or drinking it. It was the best coffee I can ever remember making! I don't give 5 stars for just doing your job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anthony Carter

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker we have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: very easy to add water without spilling as the water goes in the front of the machine...easy to read water level...easy to load filter location...very well made pot...coffee stays really hot longer than most
customer_reviews.author: Barry in MO

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved my coffee maker. I have had since mar 29, 2019. For some reason, only half a pot of coffee this morning and wont do anything now. Not happy. Do not recommend. Not even 6 months out of it. Does anyone make anything but JUNK?
customer_reviews.author: heather blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Mine came cracked internally and leaked hot coffee all over my table and cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee burned up on the hot plate for 30 minutes before I noticed. Junk. This is a classic case of you get what you pay for. I consider myself very technology intuitive. This automatic brew feature is about as stupid as it gets. I was never able to get it to make coffee before I woke up. No matter how much I messed with the programming, I had to manually start it.
customer_reviews.author: Rare Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker - great value
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I like this coffee maker so much that I decided to write one. I've had much more expensive coffee makers in the past, including a recent new 'grind and brew' from another manufacturer which was so poorly made that I literally needed to supervise it to make sure it didn't spill over while brewing. This one is a great price, so incredibly easy to use and the coffee is fantastic. It also has a timer on it that lets me know how long the coffee has been brewed for. Overall I highly recommend this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Shulkowski

customer_reviews.title: QUIT AFTER 3 WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a good coffee pot. I bought it as a birthday gift and it QUIT WORKING NOT EVEN A MONTH AFTER PURCHASING IT! I sent it back and will not be ordering another!!! SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought Nov. 2019 and it's now Sept 9th 2020. It's done! Stopped dripping full amount of coffee. Cleaned, couldn't find any clogs, etc. And steam is coming out every seam now. Afraid it's going to burn down the house! I still have cheap $15 proctor silex coffee makers from walmart that are still going strong! Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: maria c

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make very hot  coffee
customer_reviews.text: If you like a very hot hot hot coffee, don't buy this product. Nice looking, fast delivery, but this coffee machine doesn't make very hot coffee. Coffee comes warm, everytime I make coffee, I have to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is a STEAL for the money. Has features more expensive units have at half the cost. Has 3 brew settings, a side window so you can see how much water is in, a swing out basket for easy cleaning. Also comes with a charcoal filter insert for purifying the water. The unit also notifies you in the clock window when the cleaning cycle is due. Like I said, for the money, it's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Six Months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee maker six months ago and today, it just quit working. It brews and brews and steams and steams but no coffee drips down and no water leaves the chamber. I have to believe my coffee maker was expected to last longer than six months.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee R. Cuti

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After replacing 2 expensive coffee pots I went with this cheaper one. Works great. Have been using for 4 months and works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Karl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to add ground coffee.  No drips.
customer_reviews.text: Love the hinged door for the filter; makes loading coffee much easier. It's also the cone type, which is less messy to handle. When I grab the carafe, zero liquid drips from the filter bucket. Plus, it looks sleek on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: green pumas

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee grounds always end up in the carafe - they also end up plugging the basket and then unit overflows onto the counter. This has occurred multiple times despite trouble shooting measures offered in the users manual. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelle L Causley

customer_reviews.title: Clock not working 6 months after purchase. Non-refundableee
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6 months ago in July 2019. Now clock doesnt work, therefore doesnt allow auto brewing programing. Have to keep it unplugged. Afraid it could turn ON on its own and could start a fire!!! NOT HAPPY AT ALL!!!! Cant return either. Return date expired August 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Gata

customer_reviews.title: Our coffee is always rich, hot and so good.
customer_reviews.text: I did not want the round coffee basket and that is why I bought this maker. The coffee is rich, hot and the best! This is my second one. just to have on hand in case the old one quits but old one is still brewing well! We make coffee everyday, sometimes twice so well worth the money. An added bonus is being able to add the water in the front. I just hope they don’t quit making this machine!
customer_reviews.author: BIT

customer_reviews.title: Best carafe design for pouring without a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker! Easy to fill, easy to clean and the best pour spout of any coffee maker we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: RBColorado

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Really good coffee maker. Strong flavor profiles, No 4 cone filters, easy pour for water. The programmable timer is not as intuitive as some coffee makers I've had but once you figure it out it's easy and works great. Burner heats up quickly which allows for fast brewing. Overall a worthy buy, glad I soent the money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carson C.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work very well. It boil all the water away and burned the coffee. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: David Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker I ever bought. I love the fact that I can put it under my cabinets and get water and coffee into it without having to pull it out. Perfect design and good quality. Love the fact that it lets you know when it needs cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Solo111

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I like it it's easy. Tried the recommended gold filter but it didn't fit correctly. I bought the #4 Cone shaped coffee filters and am happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee maker, looks good, makes great coffee. The only con is that it's noisy. Much noisier than my previous coffeemaker. But I can live with it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: aabmh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Buttons don’t work properly I try to put the time didn’t work at all and can’t change the brew options as well
customer_reviews.author: PAOLA SERRADO

customer_reviews.title: <4 month lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. We bought this one because it was a mid-range coffee maker, not super cheap, thinking it would last for a bit. Turns out "a bit" means less than 4 months in this case, before the heating element quit and it wouldn't churn out a pot anymore. We used it what I would consider a normal amount for a coffee pot, and cleaned it regularly. No more Hamilton Beaches for us.
customer_reviews.author: NMDoyles

customer_reviews.title: It’s burning
customer_reviews.text: Got this 2 months ago. Worked great until this morning when it started smoking, filling the air with the smell of burning plastic, and was hot to the touch. I don’t think it’s supposed to do that.
customer_reviews.author: chris j ransom

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the front water area! I have no issues with this coffee pot at all. My only dislike is that the timer is only 2 hours! Sometimes I need the coffee to stay warm for longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Machine; warmer can be a bit much
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and brews pretty well. Have had the warmer scorch a pot after about 20 minutes, so wouldn’t recommend it if you’re the type to leave a pot on the warmer all morning, but does great if you drink it hot off the presses. Other than that, nice capacity, having a water filter is nice, and autobrew works just as it should. Overall good value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Finally a coffee pot that really does not drip when you pour a cup of coffee. Also, it is not difficult to replace the pot back on the burner so many are difficult due to automate stop. No problem there either.
customer_reviews.author: RedHead

customer_reviews.title: I have paid more for coffee makers half the quality of this
customer_reviews.text: You can not find a better coffee maker under $40. My last one was twice the price and it did not have as many functions. Coffee strenght is easy adjustable and super easy to use and clean it
customer_reviews.author: Tavo

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend and he loves it. He made a pot for us and I thought it seemed very easy to use with nice features you would find on a more expensive coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hak

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Slow brewer, but pours without dripping. Easy to use. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband really likes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He really likes it and has made that comment SEVERAL times. He doesn’t normally do that, HA.
customer_reviews.author: Faith of Mustard Seed

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy..
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee very easy to use.. Looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: The best part of waking up..
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I spent the $10 more than I was going to on a different coffee maker. This thing makes me happy every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Schmitts

customer_reviews.title: can't regulate warmth timer
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee maker bought on Amazon Prime in Sept 2020 but the power stopped working. Reported to Hamilton Beach and waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the fact that the water is added at the front of the Coffee pot and not the back of the park. Makes good coffee and has sufficient features.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking on the counter
customer_reviews.text: I have a Keurig which I love. But K cups are expensive and when you have a house full you need a regular coffee maker. This coffee maker is great.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love this model
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old one. Love this model; simple yet many features.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F. O'brien

customer_reviews.title: This Product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Sometime I read the good and bad reviews and think how dose the reviews vary? This coffee maker is far better than my 100 dollar coffee maker. Cone Filters in my opinion are the best and it hold it position good. The coffee pot dose not drip as you pour like my other one. Coffee taste good but but if it dose not change your brand of coffee! LOL
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: One More Cup, please!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Our second one. I broke the carafe of the first after 2 years. A little bit newer model, but basically the same as I had. Absolutely love this product!! Not many coffee makers have disposable ‘cone’ filters-which are far better -I love this feature as well!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Pannebaker

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this coffeemaker a few weeks, but so far it works great, the coffee tastes good, and it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J_Brown

customer_reviews.title: improvement over single serve
customer_reviews.text: easy to use,several brew options,fits on counter top under cabinet,I like the cleaning reminder feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer hawkradar

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Brewer
customer_reviews.text: If you have Coffee Beans grind them and have them ready when ever you want Coffee. Make sure your Coffee is Natural and grown buy local farmers of people that grow it well.
customer_reviews.author: jbfajardo98

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Carafe ergonomics superior to others, lid stays open, doesn't drip, vertical shape easier to clean. Easier to program. Also easier to see water level in chamber and easier to load water through front lid when unit sits under a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: scott glick

customer_reviews.title: Love my Coffee Maker!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Makes great coffee, even has settings to change boldness of my brews! The design is amazing, except it is tall. If you are in an older home where the top cabinets are low you may not fit this under them!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this same coffee maker. First one lasted 5 years. Great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Coffe Pot
customer_reviews.text: Like my new coffee maker, it is a bit larger than expected but love the ease on settings! Quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Lois Strange

customer_reviews.title: Works well and makes good coffee...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple of weeks and so far it has been awesome. The functions have been great, and the coffee has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Works for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this coffee maker for the first 6 months. It began slowing down the brewing after about 8 months and finally broke down completely. Super bummed it didn't even last a year :(
customer_reviews.author: TTT

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on those free filters.
customer_reviews.text: The free filters were not included in my box. Order some separately or have some on hand when your shipment arrives if you want to use this machine out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Windle

customer_reviews.title: Morning Coffee Maker, Easy to Set up and Use
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes great! Old coffee maker (another name brand) -- even with cleaning no longer had good tasting cofee. What I liked best: easy water fill (without spilling) with very visible water level numbers. Coffee comes out good and hot like I like it! All the simple features (programmable, etc.) I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Raegan

customer_reviews.title: Coffee tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Received this coffee maker with great hopes. Ran two full pot rinses through it before using. First pot was awful and had to throw it out. Tasted like plastic. Ran two pots of 9% vinegar through it and rinsed it 5 times. Still tastes like plastic. Sending it back and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coffee maker. The design is good.
customer_reviews.author: NancyC

customer_reviews.title: packaging unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: In unpacking the coffee making, having it right side up, the plastic wrap surrounding the unit was open at the bottom, so that as it was lifted out of the box, the entire thing fell on the floor and the carafe broke. Who knows whether the unit even works? There was no other way to get it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Machine. I've been using it for two months months, very easy to use, very easy to clean. Keeps the coffee hot about 2 hours or more. I Like everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Tabet

customer_reviews.title: Gets every detail right!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker I have ever owned and at a fifth the price! The front access to fill the water makes preparing this extra easy. The basket that holds the filter is easy to remove and replace. The coffee is fantastic! I don't think you can go wrong with this coffee maker. Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: mlm

customer_reviews.title: If you need a cheap coffee maker that makes 12 cups of so-so coffee, this is one of them.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The coffeemaker is exactly what it says it is and it is cheap for what you get. The coffee is not at all awful and is at least as good as any other cheap coffeemaker you are going to find when you just need anything right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my parents and they love it. Easy-to-use and clean
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 46381 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Easy Access Plus, Brew Options, Cone Filter, Black and Stainless
product_meta.description: Size:Cone Filter| Color:Black and StainlessFinally, a coffee maker that can stay tucked under a cabinet when in use. With front access to the water reservoir and brew basket, The Hamilton Beach programmable easy access Coffee maker puts an end to the back and forth maneuvering of a countertop Coffee maker. This plus 46381 includes premium features for high-end performance including a cone filter for maximum Coffee extraction, Three brewing options and a freshness indicator. A drip-free carafe makes for clean pouring, and the filter basket has a handle for mess-free grounds disposal. Plus with an automatic, optional cleaning cycle reminder, you can ensure your machine is brewing the best tasting coffee. With its compact design, This Coffee maker takes up less space but still makes up to 12 Cups. Free cone Coffee filters are included.
feature_bullets: Brew basket & water reservoir are easily accessible from the front - no need to move Coffee maker.
Filter basket with handle for mess-free grounds disposal
Cone filter maximizes Coffee extraction. Coffee maker includes a trial pack of #4 cone filters.
Automatic, optional cleaning cycle reminder: you can ensure your machine is brewing the best tasting coffee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars596 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
